description: The window size on my desktop computer, goes way beyond the screen and can not be resized. It's completely useless.

Used to play Reversi at work in the lunch time, love it. This snap app displays well on a 1932 x 1080 HD resolution display. There are no graphics dispaly controls for use with lower resolution screens. I'm using it with Ubuntu-Mate 20.04.

the game cheats i play medium and when the game is loosing it places its own color illegally mainly on the corner caught the computer doing this and confirmed it after three separate incidents and there were over five additional times the game did this --if you play this game watch the computer closely

The resolution is locked and i cant change it. The animations were really slow, i wish i could've change the animation speed or be able to turn off the animations without having to do black magic. Other than that it's... playable...
summary: It can do the basics but can't do anything else

description: This game sucks, it it always turinig my checkers white, because it can't beat me.
summary: This game always steals you tokens... what a rip off! this game is
